services.name: Personal Portfolio Website
services.description: Portfolio profesional 3-5 halaman untuk freelancer, pelajar, atau profesional. Responsif, moden, dan dioptimumkan untuk SEO.

services.name: Simple Landing Page
services.description: Halaman tunggal responsif untuk promosi produk, servis, event, atau kempen marketing.

services.name: To-Do List App
services.description: Aplikasi web ringkas untuk pengurusan tugas harian. CRUD operations, local storage, filter tasks.

services.name: Profile Card Design
services.description: Kad profil digital interaktif untuk media sosial, portfolio, atau kad perniagaan digital.

services.name: Static Gallery
services.description: Galeri foto responsif dengan grid layout, lightbox image viewer, filter kategori, dan lazy loading.

services.name: Company Website
services.description: Laman web profesional untuk syarikat kecil-sederhana. 5-10 halaman, Google Maps integration, SEO friendly.

services.name: E-commerce Frontend
services.description: Antara muka kedai online dengan product listing, product detail, shopping cart, dan product search.

services.name: Blog Frontend
services.description: Antara muka blog yang bersih dan responsif. Blog listing, single post, category filtering, search, social sharing.

services.name: Dashboard UI
services.description: Antara muka dashboard dengan charts, data tables, cards, navigation sidebar, dan dark/light mode.

services.name: Components Library
services.description: Koleksi UI components reusable seperti modal, dropdown, accordion, tabs, carousel, tooltips.

services.name: React/Vue SPA
services.description: Single Page Application moden menggunakan React.js atau Vue.js. State management, routing, API integration.

services.name: PWA Development
services.description: Progressive Web App dengan offline functionality, installable, push notifications, background sync, app-like experience.

services.name: Full E-commerce
services.description: Penyelesaian e-commerce lengkap dengan product filtering, cart, checkout UI, user authentication, order tracking, wishlist.

services.name: Interactive Dashboard
services.description: Dashboard interaktif dengan data visualization, real-time updates, advanced charts, drill-down capabilities.

services.name: Portfolio + CMS
services.description: Portfolio lengkap dengan blog dan headless CMS integration (Strapi/Sanity/WordPress). Boleh update content sendiri.

services.name: Deployment Service
services.description: Setup hosting, domain configuration, SSL certificate, dan deploy website ke Netlify, Vercel, atau platform lain.

services.name: Extra Page
services.description: Tambah halaman baru ke website sedia ada. Design & development, integration, responsive, SEO optimized.

services.name: Additional Revisions
services.description: Revisi tambahan selepas project completion. Perubahan minor, content updates, bug fixes.

services.name: Basic SEO
services.description: On-page SEO optimization: meta tags, title tags, heading structure, image alt text, sitemap.xml, robots.txt.

services.name: WhatsApp Integration
services.description: Integrasi WhatsApp button, chat widget, click-to-chat dengan pre-filled message templates.

services.name: Freelancer GIS
services.description: Pemetaan risiko banjir, digitasi peta, analisis spatial, dan konsultasi GIS menggunakan ArcGIS Desktop, QGIS, dan FME Desktop.

services.name: Custom Templates
services.description: Reka bentuk custom templates untuk business cards, certificates, resumes, dan dokumen profesional lain.

services.name: Excel Dashboards
services.description: Report automation, data visualization, dan dashboard interaktif menggunakan Microsoft Excel advanced.

services.name: Interactive Ebooks
services.description: Digital books dengan flip animation, interactive elements, dan PDF flipbooks untuk marketing atau edukasi.

workExperience.role: Assistant Project Manager / Assistant GIS Executive

education.thesis: Thesis: Earthquake Risk Mapping in Sabah Using Geographic Information System (GIS)

education.institution: SMK Lui Barat (Felda) Bandar Seri Jempol, Negeri Sembilan

projects.title: 3D Interactive Portfolio Book
projects.description: Interactive 3D book portfolio with flip animation, dark mode, and responsive design.

projects.title: PWA Case Study: Building a 100% Offline Portfolio
projects.description: Interactive case study demonstrating Progressive Web App capabilities with offline functionality, installability, and performance optimization.
